text: Minimum Optional investigations investigations Respiratory @ Plain chest X-ray e PFT (bronchodilator system reversibility) ABG e Pulmonary diffusion capacity Spirometry(FEV1.FVC) Cardiovascular ® ECG ® Dobutamine stress ech system Echo e Dipyridamole/thalliun seintigraphy Blood Complete blood count | @ Liver function tests Clotting profile Cross match Urea/electrolytes
